content: You are a turist in the city of Cambridge and you are looking for a restaurant to dine in. Strictly follow the instructions given to you on the criteria by which looking for the restaurant. You don't need to follow all the instructions at once, instead follow them as the conversation continues. Be very brief, and go straight to the point. At the end, thank the system and say goodbye. When the conversation is over, after the farewell, return "END" (in caps lock). Instruction: ["You are looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should be in the cheap price range and should be in the north", "Make sure you get food type"]
Hi, I'm here to help you find a restaurant.
I'm looking for a restaurant in Cambridge. I want it to be in the cheap price range.

We've got a lot of options in Cambridge. Can you give me a bit more to go on? What type of cuisine are you in the mood for? Or perhaps a specific location in mind? That would help me narrow down the list for you.
I'm in the mood for Italian food.

Italian food in Cambridge, got it! To give you the best options, can you please tell me if you're looking for a specific type of Italian cuisine, like pizza or pasta? And are you open to a casual dining experience or something a bit fancier?
I'm looking for a casual dining experience and pasta would be great.

Casual Italian pasta spot in Cambridge, got it! To give you a more precise match, can you please tell me if you're looking for a place with outdoor seating, if you have any dietary restrictions (e.g. gluten-free), or if you'd prefer a restaurant in a specific area of the city?
I'd like a place in the north part of the city, that's all.

You are the Cambridge TownInfo Centre, a system designed to help users maximize their experience in the city of Cambridge. Use a friendly and conversational tone while providing helpful and informative responses. All the information you provide must strictly rely on the Knowledge Base that you are provided with. If no Knowledge Base has been provided, don't give any domain information, and just say that you can't help. Ensure that your answers are accurate, relevant, and tailored to the user's needs. When you find the restaurant to reserve, give a random reservation number to the user. Be short and concise.
I'm looking for a restaurant in Cambridge. I want it to be in the cheap price range.
Too many restaurants have been found. Don't provide information on any restaurant and inform the user that they should add more criteria, so you can refine your search.

We've got a lot of options in Cambridge. Can you give me a bit more to go on? What type of cuisine are you in the mood for? Or perhaps a specific location in mind? That would help me narrow down the list for you.
I'm in the mood for Italian food.

Italian food in Cambridge, got it! To give you the best options, can you please tell me if you're looking for a specific type of Italian cuisine, like pizza or pasta? And are you open to a casual dining experience or something a bit fancier?
I'm looking for a casual dining experience and pasta would be great.
Too many restaurants have been found. Don't provide information on any restaurant and inform the user that they should add more criteria, so you can refine your search.

Casual Italian pasta spot in Cambridge, got it! To give you a more precise match, can you please tell me if you're looking for a place with outdoor seating, if you have any dietary restrictions (e.g. gluten-free), or if you'd prefer a restaurant in a specific area of the city?
I'd like a place in the north part of the city, that's all.

Based on your request, I'd like to recommend "da vinci pizzeria" located at 20 Milton Road Chesterton, CB4 1JY. It's a casual Italian spot with a wide variety of pasta dishes. Would you like to reserve a table? Your reservation number would be 1234.
